src:
Ex Ilva, terminato dopo 3 ore e mezza vertice governo-Mittal
Riunione a Palazzo Chigi con vertici multinazionale

06 Nov 2019, 14:43




Roma, 6 nov. (askanews) – E’ finito dopo circa 3 ore e mezzo l’incontro tra il governo e i vertici di Mittal a Palazzo Chigi.
Alla riunione sulla questione dell’ex Ilva erano presenti il premier Giuseppe Conte, i ministri Stefano Patuanelli, Roberto Gualtieri, Peppe Provenzano, Roberto Speranza e Teresa Bellanova e il sottosegretario Mario Turco.
Per l’azienda hanno partecipato i proprietari Lakshmi Mittal e Aditya Mittal.
Afe/int5
text:
Ex Ilva, ended after 3 hours and a half summit between government and Mittal
Meeting at Palazzo Chigi with multinational leaders

06 Nov 2019, 14:43




Rome, November 6th (askanews) - The meeting between the government and the heads of Mittal at Palazzo Chigi ended after about 3 and a half hours.
Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, ministers Stefano Patuanelli, Roberto Gualtieri, Peppe Provenzano, Roberto Speranza and Teresa Bellanova and Undersecretary Mario Turco were present at the meeting on the issue of the former Ilva.
The owners were Lakshmi Mittal and Aditya Mittal.
Afe / INT5
